sentences.sContent: The scandalous, seditious and libelous books that need to be brought to justice in this remarkable sentence are suddenly revealed to have a soul.
sentences.sContent_eng: The scandalous, seditious and libelous books that need to be brought to justice in this remarkable sentence are suddenly revealed to have a soul.
sentences.sCn: 有诽谤性的煽动性的中伤性的需要被审判的书,在这句话里突然被透露出是有灵魂的。

words.tran: 过分地；诽谤性地；令人愤慨地
丑闻；流言蜚语；诽谤；公愤
专事诽谤的人；散布丑闻者
（英）使感震惊；使愤慨；诽谤；使丢脸（等于scandalize）
